name: Website Design and Development
description: Modern business websites with hosting, admin panel options and SEO capabilities.
notes: Price depends on pages, features and complexity.

name: App Design and Development
description: Mobile apps with backend, storage, auth system, and optional admin panel.
notes: Custom features and Play store affect delivery time.

name: Bots, Automation (email,chat,etc & 360) and AI systems
description: Professional bots with AI and there pipeline.

name: Social Media Management
description: We manage your brand across multiple platforms with posts, strategy and reporting.

types.label: All Platforms (IG, FB, L, X, YT, Shorts, Pinterest, Threads)

notes: Posting frequency and platform count affect cost.

name: Video Editing
description: Professional video editing including reels, promotional videos, intros, transitions, and color grading.
notes: Longer or more complex edits require more time and cost.

name: Brand Identity
description: Complete brand identity including logo, card design, printing, color palettes, posters and social media kit.
notes: Includes 2–3 revisions depending on design package.
